name: mini-sql
description: Minimal SQL interpreter written in JavaScript

scripts.build:test: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.deploy:major: (npm run build:test && npm version major) && npm publish
scripts.deploy:minor: (npm run build:test && npm version minor) && npm publish
scripts.deploy:patch: (npm run build:test && npm version patch) && npm publish
